*********************************************
*
* App: WatchGuard Firebox App
* Current Version: 1.1
* Last Modified: Nov 2021
* Splunk Version: 8.x
* Author: WatchGaurd Technologies Inc.
*
*********************************************

**** Overview ****

The WatchGuard Firebox App is a basic default dashboard to enable displaying
Firebox logs and events. This app is designed to be deployed along side the
WatchGuard Technical Add-On (TA), which is responsible for transforming
Firebox syslogs into Splunk-compatible events.
